latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
Child care service not free of pests or maintains pest harborage conditions at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to use available environmentally sensitive cleaning products at time of inspection

At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take appropriate action to keep facility free of pests or conditions conducive to pests Child care service fails to maintain extermination service log
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to notify parents of pesticide application 48 hours before use Notification was incomplete
